attributes.additional_details:
Plymouth and the surrounding areas are cut off from the rest of the Country.

No airport.

No motorway.

Now, no rail.

We are the forgotten area of the UK and we sit by and accept it. Now is the time to change that.

The completely unjustified HS2 line must be reconsidered and some of that money reallocated to improve the transport infrastructure in the South West.

The monies being quoted for HS2 could connect Plymouth by road, rail and air.

We have sat by for too long. Not anymore.

#PlymouthDeservesBetter
